Title: Authorizes the town of Hempstead in the county of Nassau to establish a residential parking system in the neighborhoods of Bellrose Terrace and Elmont
Summary: Authorizes the town of Hempstead in the county of Nassau to establish a residential parking system in the neighborhoods of Bellrose Terrace and Elmont.
LawCode: Add ยง1640-r, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to authorizing the town of Hempstead in the county of Nassau to establish a residential parking system in the neighborhoods of Bellrose Terrace and Elmont
